short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically redirects your Google searches to the classic web only version of Google Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the clutter and distractions on modern search engines? Want to experience the simplicity and speed of Google's classic web-only search? Look no further! Classic Web Search is here to take you back to the good old days.

With Classic Web Search, you can:

- Remove the Clutter: Automatically redirects your Google searches to the classic web-only version. No more distractions, just pure information.
- Toggle with Ease: Enable or disable the extension with a single click from the extension icon. You have full control over your browsing experience.
- Stay Informed: The extension icon changes color based on whether the classic web search is enabled or not, keeping you informed at all times.

Classic Web Search is perfect for those who value simplicity and speed. It's like taking a step back in time, to when the internet was less about ads and more about information.

So why wait? Install Classic Web Search today and experience the classic Google search like never before!
